div.p:
Curia capitalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
per balliuos eiusdem vltimo die mensis aprilis Anno Domini et cetera quo supra nonogesimo
secundo

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Alexander chamer
of murchil forspekar that William gareache eldar sal gathir in and vptak
the haile fraucht of the nicholes and mak pament to the relict of mavnis
Wormet of samekle' of the said' fraucht as pertenis to hir scho payand'
the clerkis fee sayfar as pertenis to hir part of the clerkis fee safar'
as pertenis to hir of reson' And' samekill as scho has takin vpe
of the saide fraucht beinge allouit In hir' parte

Eodem die Andreas Wenton' fecit constituit et ordinavit Alexandrum chamer de murchill suum
verum et legittimum procuratorem in causa mota contra ipsum per alexandrum forbes penes clameum quinque
marcarum iiij s' et octo d' cum omnibus clausis ad procuratorium necessariis de Jure ac consuetudine
promitten' de Rato et grato

the said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Jonhne' sanclar' forspekar
that Dauid Duffous sal content and pay to Dauid aysone xxxtj s' of Siluer
or four' stane of woll In the nayme of marione Dogud' his modir
quhilkis the ballieis chargit him to pay within terme of law the said'
Dauid ayson deliueringe to him ane toppat price xxx d' or samekle'
siluer

the said day the ballieis ordanit to warne the relict of Duncan lundoris
to comper one friday that next cummis befor tham that thai mycht do Justice to
Jonhne thomson anent the chamer loft and butht pertening to him that scho
occupeis

the said' day the action' debatabile betuix William philp and the wyf of Sandris
rolland' is continevit to this day aucht dais in hoip of concorde in siclik strintht
as It is now but preiudice til ony party

the saide day the ballies assignit friday that next cumis to Androw lam
mynton' to preyf quhat gudis of ayrschipe that Jonhne Dauison
deyt last possessit and ordanit the relict of vmquhill the saide Jonhne
to comper befor tham the saide day to her' and se the forsaide prewis
that thai mycht do Justice anent the ayrschip clamyt be the said' Androw
In his douchtir nayme

the said day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to Alexander chamer procurator to
Androw Wentone to ansuer to the burghe' strekin apon him be Alexander forbes
for the wranguis' haldinge fra him of v merkis iiij s' and viij d'

the said Alexander forbes protestit solempnitlie for his Costis skathis and expens'
as for the principale Some

the samyn day the ballieis assignit friday that next cumis to gilbert mureson'
to ansuer' to the borghe strekit apon him be g Androw Wenton' for
the wranguis' haldin fra him of vj s' g' as day of peremptour' as
merchand' to merchand' suld' do

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominum Andreas gray et matheus nicholson
procuratores capellanorum collegij abirdonensis et protestati sunt pro vno annuo redditu
x s' dictis capellanis annuatim de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum
ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Richardi Kintor ex
australi et terram Capellanj et altaris Sancti petri ex boreali ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperierunt distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
Willelmo fyve Willelmo philp et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Andreas gray et matheus nicholson'
capellanj procuratores capellanorum collegij abirdonensis et protestati sunt pro vno annuo
Redditu x s' dictis capellanis annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis fechat ex boreali et terram
quondam Johannis andirsone ex australi boriali Ad quam terram accedens nichi reperierunt distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo die
huius processus Testibus Johanne Durvard Willelmo cuminge et thoma Jameson seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus andirson senior et protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo redditu iiijor s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico
nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam roberti nevyson' ex australi
et terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius
processus Testibus Johanne Durvarde Willelmo cuminge et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die thomas rolland' solempniter protestatus fuit quod processus deductus per
Alexandrum mar penes quandam terram Jacentem in vico furcarum inter terram Dauid
prat ex australi et terram Eduardi top ex boreali non cedat sibi in preiudicium
ex et pro eo quod in legittima possessione dicte terra fuit per legittimos processus precedentes

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus andirsone Junior et protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo redditu iiijor s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico nauium inter terram Johannis fechat ex boreali et terram quondam Johannis
andirsone ex australi ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo die
huius processus Testibus Roberto Walcar ada heruy et Andrea nachty
seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Robertus blinsele et protestatus fuit pro vno
annuo redditu Septem s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in
futy inter terram Willelmi harpar ex australi et terram Johannis matlande ex
boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Alexandro gareache Willelmo blytht et thoma Jameson' seriando

The said day It was deliuerit be the hale counsale that Johne' gryg sal content and pay
to sere Johne' stirueling procuratour' to Jonhne stronoch' burges of montross' the avale
of fyve rynche guldingis in scottis money as he that becom borch' til entir Wilyeam
scherar' for the said some' as he that was bundin be his obligacioune to the said'
Johne' stronoch' And falyeit tharin til / And ordanis the officiaris to caus' him to be pait
within' terme of law This deliuerance and Act as writin with mastir Jonhne baide
nachis' hand in the tyme of the furthgeving' of the said' deliuerance be Jonhne colison'
In the name of the hale counsale et cetera

The saide day Dauid aysone burges of Dunde scho ane procuratory of Jhon'
redis of byrrone that he was lauchfule procuratour for him for the quhilkis
William Wormet dischargit Jonhne fechat of al clamys aucht him be the
saide Jonhne rede Ande the saide Jonhne fechat come Souerte to entir the said
Dauid within the tolbutht the ferd day of this Instant monetht off
may to ansuer to the said William as law will as procurator' to the saide
Jonhne red'

Eodem die assignatur hodie ad quindenam Dauid Kintor ad repondendum plegio super ipsum
porrecto per thomam quhit pro iniusta detencione ab eo summe quatuor li' monete scocie tanquam
2o die processus

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die maij
Anno quo supra

The said day Jonhne Colison askit thomas mar' sex squair' pundis
gretis acht him for ane quartar of ane schip callit the barbara quhilkis
Some the said' thomas allegit was pait and the said Jonhne denyit the pament
of it and askit and requirit the said action' to be put to the decisione of
ane assis' suorne tharto Ande and the said thomas allegit it suld' nocht
pas' to the determinacion of ane assis' / the said partiis beinge remouyt
the court wardit that the said action' suld' pas' to the determinacion
of ane assis' becaus' the court was clede and the pament of
the said Some denyit the said partiis being remouit the court wardit
that the said action suld' pas' to the decision' of ane assis' Ande gif the
assis' being suorne be waik the aldirman and balyeis sal caus' vthiris
unsuspect personis best of knaulege and vndirstandin be suorne and ekit to the
said' assis' gif tha may gottyne this day And gif thai may nocht be compre
hendit thai suld' ger' warne the best of the towne agan monunday and be
suorne and determe the said action as law will according to Justice

The said day thomas mar' fand j borghe' in his handis of philp Dunbrek
officiar' that the said action acht nocht to pas' to the determinacion of ane assis'
for his resonnis to be schavin quhar' it efferit

The samyn day Jonhne colison reconterit the said borghe sayand' it auche to
pas' to the decisione of ane assis' for resonnis to be schavyn'
quhar it efferit

The samyn day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Androu branche forspekar
that Dauid ayson burges of Dunde procurator' to Jonhne red Induellar of
byrrone sal content and pay to William Wormet fiwe crovnis Scottis
money aucht to him be the said Jonhne red quhilk the balyeis chargit him
to pay to the said William within terme of law

The samyn day the action' debatabile betuix Jonhne colison and thomas mar'
anent Sex squair' li' g' clamit be the said Jonhne and the borghe' strekit
be the said thomas and recovnter maid be the said Jonhne is continevit for
waknes of the Court to monunday that next cumis in sic strintht force
and effect as it is now but preiudice of ony party

the said day Alexander menyeis said that he maid a fre tone the last yer' that he was
in office of aldirmanschipe of Abirdene

the said day the aldirman and ballieis ordanit philp Dunbrek and thomas
Jamesone officiaris to pas' and warne conny menyeis to comper befor thame
one monunday that next cumis to ansuer to the borghe' strekit apon hir
be Jonhne of Kintor for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xxx s' of
his maile of the Witsonday terme bigan perempturlie becaus' scho was oft
tymes warnit and wald' nocht comper

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio quinto die mensis maij Anno
quo supra

The said day Jonhne fechat come Souerte be his handis vphaldin landis
and gudis to thome prat that his douchtir the relict of thomas chamer
salbe pait of ale thingis avand' hir or the pris' pas' out of the
havin of Abirdene

The said day the aldirman chargit Jonhne menyeis Androw Culan and
androw culan balyeis' to pas' and distrenye Androu Waus his gudis
and mak redy pament of the rediast of thame to the larde of
many of Sevin markis acht to him eftir the tenor' of the akis
made obefor'

The samyn day Williame goldsmitht oblist him be his hand vphaldin
to content and pay to the lard of garntuly or his procuratouris ane or may
fiwe vnce of Siluer and j quartar of vnce at Witsonday next eftir
follouing but fraude or gile

The saide day Dauid Duffous' fande Jonhne fechat at the key Sourte
be his landis and gudis his hand vphaldin to keipe and warand Androw
mureson' skathles anent j quartar of ane schipe callit the nicholes bocht
be the said Androw fra the said Dauid and to warand him the said j quartar schip
for ale Scottis men' fre for al clamez in tym' to cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Septimo
die maij Anno quosupra

Eodem die actio debatabilis inter Alexandrum mar et thomam rolland' penes
clameum cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis in vico furcarum continuatur cum consensu parcium vsque
ad quadragesimum diem legittimum proxime sequentem in talibus forma et effectu iuris absque
preiudicio parcium

the said day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to thomas mar to
ansuer to the borghe' strekit apon him be alexander Matheson' for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of xviij li' to the frethin of his lande that is constrenyeit be the kingis lettres
at the Instance of agnes colp and hir procuratouris as he that awche to frethe the
said' lande and kep the said Alexander skathles of the saide Some et cetera

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day xv dais to thomas mar'
to ansuer to the borghe' Strekit apon him be Jonhne colisone for the wrang
uislie withhaldin fra him of Sex squair li g' of the rest of ane gretar
some for j quartar of the barbora schip callit the barbora bocht fra him
nochtwithstandinge that he gravnt ane acquitance of the hale Some for
diuers' caus'

The saide day Dauid aysone procurator to Jonhne rede of byrrone graunt him
to haue sauld' to Jonhne fechat and Dauid Duffous' ane schip callit nicholes
of the quhilkis he held him pait oblisinge him to kep the tone skathles tharanent
for the saide Jonhne now and foreuir be ale his landis and gudis present and
to cum

the saide day sere William muresone offerit j key to Jonhne
malisone of the butht that Elizibeth' bevmond' breukit with the maile that
efferis tharto saylange as scho occupeit the saide hous'

the said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' James cuminge
forspekar that Robertsone ewinsone is quyt of xvij li' waxe clamit
be Williame Symson'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio octauo die maij anno quo supra

the saide day Androw branche protestit that the deposicion of Johnne gilespy
suld' turne him to nay preiudice for resonnis to be schevin quhen'
it efferis

The saide day the aldirman at commavnd of diuers' of the consaile present
for the tyme grantit to Sele ane testimoniale with the Secret sele producit
be Androw murray and vthiris nichtbouris anent the makin of tham quyt of vjxx
li' g' for the persevit of thar gudis in the court of burgunye makinge
mencion that thar was dome gevin be the moutht of Jonhne Williamson'
dempstar of the court the tyme of the saide deliuerance aganis mastir Androw
cadiow

the saide day the aldirman schew to diuers' of the consal and communite present for the
tyme that thar was ane nethis fischingis of the mydchingile that mastir Androw
cadiow and Androw Culane his brothir sulde haue fischit gangand' wast and nay
man fischand' tham quharthrow the maile quhart was habill to cum apon
the tone and askit at tham quhat suld' be done tharto Ande thai ordanit
the aldirman to ger fische the saide nethis fischinge gif thai that th it
was set to and hed' resone to tham refusit and wald' nocht fische tham and
to pay the male and to ansuer' to the tone for the ourcome
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xj die maij Anno quo supra

the saide day Androu murray eldar Androw Wentone Dauid prat Richerd
hile and Robert crage was chosin be the consal and communite and suorne to extent
and taxt the Some of xx li' to augmentacion to the ambaxat to pas'
for our' Souerane lordis mariage

the samyn day the consale present for the tyme ordanit the ballieis to ger
red' the chamer loft and butht to Jhone thomsone quhilkis he bocht fra Dun
can lundoris becaus' he schew plane chartir of Sellinge and ane letter of
Sesin and to ger' him be obeit in the Josin of the samyn for ony richtis
schevin in the contrar befor thame as yet
Curia balliuorum legalis tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiij die maij anno quo supra

the said day thomas prat and Walter auchneywe for thame and thar
fallouschipe grantit to pay thar haile fraucht to Willekin gelison'
mastir of the Katherin vndir god Ande copin the gravyne and cornelys
vanthebery merchandis of the said schip oblist thame be the fathtis of
thar bodiis to stand at the ordinance and deliuerance of fiwe suorne
personis or of ane suorne assis' and to refund to the saidez thomas
Walter and thar follouis samekile Salt as thai ordanis tham to pay
gif thai happin to be adiugit in ony be the said personis or assis' vnsuspectis

the said day Copin grevin was ordanit be certan personis suorne tharto to
pay and deliuer ane twne fraucht to Jonhne fechat for his fee

Eodem die Dauid Kintor legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio super ipsum porrecto per
thomam quhit pro iniusta detencione ab eo summe iiij li' monete scocie non comparuit Igitur precipitur phi
lippo Dunbrek seriando ad capiendum districtum ad eodem Dauid et premunire eum ad proximam curiam
legalem hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum et cetera tanquam 3o die huius processus
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvj die maij Anno quo supra

the said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas prat
forspekar that Androw Waus restis avand' to gilbert Waus of many
xiiij s' and x d' of maile for his Innys Ande gif the said androw
previs' one monunday cum viij dais befor the balyeis in this court that the
firlot of gret salt come to the vys' of the saide gilbert thane he salbe
dischargit of demi merk of the said xiiij s' and x d' and gif he falyeis
in his preywe he sal pay the hall money
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xviijo die maij Anno quo supra

The samyn day comperit philp Dunbrek officiar' with certan suorne personis
with him that is to say Dauid spens' henry lorne and Alexander tailyour'
quhilkis deponit be thar aithis that the ferd' mercat day thai prisit ane
pece of mellay clath extendinge to xxij eln' to ij s' Ilkan eln'
summa xliiij s' as thai fand the said clath that tyme quhilkis clath
was present iij dais obefor to the mercat befor sufficient witnes and xvj d'
pait to the officiare

The said day Jonhne gilespy grantit to pay ix s' g' licht money
to Androw lousone within terme of law

The said day it was sufficiently preuit be suorne personis that Androw
lammyntone sal pay ij merkis Scottis money to Dauid spens for the
x s' g' awand' him as is contenit in the ak maid tharapone obefor
